title: Safe Houses in San Luis Potosi
name: Safe Houses in San Luis Potosi
description: This data presents a safe house in San Luis Potosi, Mexico.

properties.basictitle: Three Kidnapped Women Rescued from Safe House in San Luis Potosi
properties.bid: 11/30/2011: On Wednesday, in Colonia El Salitral, Villa de Reyes Municipality, San Luis Potosi, San Luis Potosi, Mexico, the Mexican army along with the Federal and State Police rescued three alleged kidnapping victims from a safe house used by an organized crime group. One of the women who was kidnapped was a minor. The group abandoned the safe house when they saw the military and fled in the direction of Santa Maria del Rio Municipality and escaped arrest. The kidnappers were allegedly young men from a gang travelling abroad a yellow Chevrolet Avalanche-type vehicle, a brown Suburban, and a black Ford Explorer-type vehicle.
